if the spirits modulates or radiates from within the cage, the signa=

Mike didn't cover the reasoning behind the Faraday Box in his YOU=
TUBE video...is it to prevent unwanted signals to come through? Seems like =
the Faraday Box could be self defeating...IE, if you are expecting radios s=
ignals to "come through", how can they? 
Again, this leads back to the ques=
tioning whether it is the signals or the noise and the effects that spirits=
 use to communicate with? IF spirits are using EVP's to communicate! I am s=
till open to the possibility that spirits are. Doesn't mean the spirits ARE=
...LOL.

<p>Mike didn't cover the reasoning behind the Faraday B=
ox in his YOUTUBE video...is it to prevent unwanted signals to come through=
? Seems like the Faraday Box could be self defeating...IE, if you are expec=
ting radios signals to "come through", how can they? </p>
<p>Again, this le=
ads back to the questioning whether it is the signals or the noise and the =
effects that spirits use to communicate with? IF spirits are using EVP's to=
 communicate! I am still open to the possibility that spirits are. Doesn't =
mean the spirits ARE...LOL.</p>
